title: Shell Shockers Unblocked
description: Shell Shockers is a free-to-play, browser-based first-person shooter where you battle as a heavily armed egg in fast-paced online arenas. This quirky multiplayer .io FPS stands out with its hilarious egg theme and surprisingly deep gunplay. Jump into public or private matches, choose from seven unique weapons like the EggK-47 or Scrambler shotgun, and fight across colorful maps in modes such as Free For All, Teams, Capture the Spatula, and King of the Coop. Shell Shockers delivers quick matchmaking, responsive controls, and endless replayabilityâ€”no downloads required, just crack in and start blasting.
instructions:
WASD to move

Space to Jump

E to change weapons

Q for grenade

Left mouse to shoot

Shift to aim

R to reload

F to melee
